title: XP balance is unreal this patch
body: I genuinely do not understand the logic behind the new xp. Solo laners level SOOOO much faster than bot lane, it just makes bot lane an unfun lane to play. Just played a game where me and my ADC were level 11 and 12 when the solo laners and our jungler were level 17 and 18. It made us bot laners literally scrounge up any gold and any xp we could find on the map. It makes the game feel like a survival PVE game rather than a PVP, team based game. Being so far behind in xp and gold just takes you out of the game. Just feels awful to play. Please reconsider the XP changes.

replies.body:
XP changes pan out as follows:
As a duo laner, once every 6 minutes presuming you never miss XP you lose 1 caster minion of XP
As a solo laner once every 3 minutes presuming you never miss XP you gain 1 caster minion of XP

With the way that different minion XP goes, you are losing 1 wave of XP per 24 minutes relative to your solo laners. You're not a whole wave behind - it's mostly in them having more XP.

It's... not much different to before unless you're jungle.

i've been saying this today as well... if your team is behind, the entire enemy team is going to come botlane first because it's easy pickins. A smooth doublekill on two underleveled players, conveniently right by drake! plus the added bonus of the alcove making these plays even easier to execute. seriously what the hell. bot lane is not fun to play. top lane doesn't seem fun either. seems like 'if you are not a roaming assassin/mage then screw your experience' to me. being support is the real struggle though. enchanter supps are a dying class. they can't cs or defend themselves. they can't roam because they have no dashes or whatever to get out safely. the power creep with all these new champs is thinning the roster and diversity heavily. Every game feels the same because it's always the same champs getting locked in.
